TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TiffBitmapDecoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapDecoder
Public NotInheritable Class TiffBitmapDecoder Inherits BitmapDecoder

Docs.summary: Defines a decoder for Tagged Image File Format (TIFF) encoded images.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

Docs.param: Initialization options for the bitmap image.
The caching method for the bitmap image.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified file stream, with the specified and .

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnLoad> cache option if you wish to close the `bitmapStream` after the decoder is created. The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption.OnDemand> cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to create an instance of and use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.TiffBitmapDecoder> from a file stream. The decoded image is used as the source of an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Image> control.
[!code-cpp[tiffbitmapdecoderencoder#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TiffBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/TiffEncoderDecoder.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[tiffbitmapdecoderencoder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TiffBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/TiffEncoderDecoder.cs#1)] [!code-vb[tiffbitmapdecoderencoder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TiffBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/TiffEncoderDecoder.vb#1)]

Docs.exception: The is not a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_tiff](~/includes/tlasharptla-tiff-md.md)] encoded image.
